section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: log1p calculates the natural logarithm of 1+x. You can use log1p rather than `log(1+x)' for greater precision when x is very small. log1pf calculates the same thing, but accepts and returns float values rather than double.

section.title: Returns
section.p: log1p returns a double, the natural log of 1+x. log1pf returns a float, the natural log of 1+x.
